message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 85
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
DCAT: Data Catalog Vocabulary 
•
DCAT is an RDF vocabulary designed to facilitate 
interoperability between data catalogs published on the Web. 
•
DCAT increases discoverability and enable applications 
easily to consume metadata from multiple catalogs.  
•
Main concepts described in DCAT are: 
•
Catalog 
•
Catalog record 
•
Dataset 
•
Distribution 
•
Download 
•
Web service 
 
 
87 
•
http://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/
speaker: SYSTEM
